Package front.controller

Class CsvImportatorController

java.lang.Object
front.controller.Controller
front.controller.SceneController
front.controller.CsvImportatorController
public class CsvImportatorController extends SceneController
This SceneController is used to control the csv importation scene.

      public CsvImportatorController(javafx.stage.Stage stage, Collection<? extends File> filesToImport, boolean generateLogFile)
      Parameters:
      filesToImport - a Collection<? extends File> with all files used to import teenagers.
      generateLogFile - a boolean to know if the controller has to generate log files.
